name: Particle Pushers
description:
Push Particles around!

This is my midterm for C++ programming class. 

Manipulate the direction and lifetime of the particles by placing down icons to interact with them.

Instructions:

Press E and Q to cycle through the interactive Icons.

Click and drag the icons to place them on the screen.

Make a path for the particles to get from their starting position to their end position.

When a level is completed a spinning cube will appear at the center of the screen. Press Spacebar to continue.
